privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: TicketWaze (“TicketWaze”, “we”, “us”, or “our”) values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and share information when you access or use our website, applications, and services (collectively, the “Service”). By using TicketWaze, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

1.title: Information We Collect
1.description: When you use TicketWaze, we may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide, such as your name, email address, phone number, billing details, and any information you submit when creating an account, purchasing tickets, organizing activities, or contacting support. If you are an organizer, we may also collect information related to your organization, activities, and payout details. In addition to information you provide directly, we automatically collect certain technical and usage information when you access the Service. This may include your IP address, device type, browser information, operating system, pages visited, and interactions with the platform. This data helps us understand how the Service is used and improve performance and security. We may also collect approximate location information derived from your IP address in order to display relevant activities and improve user experience. Precise location data is only collected when you explicitly grant permission.

2.title: How We Use Your Information
2.description: TicketWaze uses personal information to operate and improve the Service, create and manage user accounts, process ticket purchases and payments, facilitate organizer payouts, communicate important updates, respond to customer support requests, personalize content, and detect or prevent fraudulent or unauthorized activity. We may also use your information for analytics and internal reporting to improve our platform and features. Where permitted by law, we may send you marketing or promotional communications related to TicketWaze. You can opt out of these communications at any time.

3.title: Sharing and Disclosure
3.description: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who help us operate the Service, such as payment processors, hosting providers, analytics services, and customer support tools. These providers are only authorized to use your data as necessary to perform services on our behalf. We may disclose personal information if required to comply with applicable laws, regulations, legal processes, or enforceable governmental requests. We may also share information to protect the rights, safety, and property of TicketWaze, our users, activity organisation, or the public, including for fraud prevention and security purposes. In the event of a business transaction such as a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, user information may be transferred as part of that transaction, subject to applicable privacy protections.

4.title: Data Security
4.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal information against unauthorized access, loss, misuse, or alteration. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your data, no method of transmission or storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. While we do our best, no method is 100% secure—so please use strong passwords and protect your devices.

5.title: Your Rights and Choices
5.description: Depending on your location, you may have rights regarding your personal data, including the right to access, correct, or delete your information. You may also have the right to object to certain processing activities or request data portability. Requests can be made by contacting TicketWaze using the information provided below. We may need to verify your identity before fulfilling such requests. To exercise these rights, contact:

6.title: Cookies & Tracking
6.description: TicketWaze uses cookies and similar technologies to ensure the proper functioning of the platform, remember user preferences, analyze traffic, and improve the overall experience. You can control or disable cookies through your browser settings, although doing so may affect certain features of the Service. Access is restricted to authorized personnel only.

7.title: Data Retention
7.description: We retain personal information only for as long as necessary to provide the Service, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, enforce agreements, and support legitimate business operations. When data is no longer required, we take reasonable steps to delete or anonymize it.

10.description: Your information may be stored and processed in countries outside of your country of residence. By using the Service, you consent to the transfer of your information to countries that may have different data protection laws than your own.
